data.description: Welcome to 70 Creek Way, Covington, GA – where charm meets contemporary living! This delightful 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath home is a perfect blend of style and functionality, offering a lifestyle of comfort and convenience. Step into this well-maintained home and enjoy formal living and dining spaces that provide the ideal backdrop for entertaining guests or enjoying family gatherings. The ample closet space ensures that organization is a breeze, keeping your home clutter-free and your belongings neatly tucked away. The sunny kitchen is a chef's delight, providing a bright and welcoming space to prepare delicious meals. The double garage adds a touch of practicality, ensuring you have convenient parking for your vehicles. This home is part of a vibrant sidewalk community that boasts fantastic amenities, including a swim tennis facility for fitness and recreation, a serene community pond for relaxation, and a playground for the little ones to play and explore. Situated in a well-established neighborhood, 70 Creek Way offers a sense of community and security. You'll find yourself just minutes away from shops and grocery stores, making errands a breeze. With easy access to major highways, commuting is convenient, putting the best of Covington and beyond at your fingertips. Don't miss the opportunity to make this charming contemporary home yours. Schedule a showing today and discover the perfect blend of style, comfort, and community at 70 Creek Way!
